text: The Remarkable Mr. Pennypacker is a 1959 American comedy movie directed by Henry Levin and was based on the 1953 play of the same name. It stars Clifton Webb, Dorothy McGuire, Charles Coburn, Ron Ely, Jill St. John, Ray Stricklyn, Dorothy Stickney and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * The Remarkable Mr. Pennypacker at TCMDB * * Category:1959 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Henry Levin Category:Movies composed by Leigh Harline
title: The Remarkable Mr. Pennypacker
